meanings.definition: Transmit or communicate by means of heliograph.
meanings.sent1: The explorer heliographed his location to the rescue team.
meanings.sent2: The soldiers heliographed signals across the valley.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel heliographed a secret message to its friends in the trees.
meanings.sent4: The sun heliographed its rays through the clouds.
meanings.sent5: She heliographed her love for him in the sky with a giant mirror.

meanings.sent1: The mountaineer heliographed for help from the mountaintop.
meanings.sent2: The lighthouse keeper heliographed warnings to ships at sea.
meanings.sent3: The cat heliographed its desire for treats to its owner.
meanings.sent4: The fireworks heliographed colorful bursts in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The dancer heliographed her emotions through graceful movements.

meanings.definition: To send a message by heliograph.
meanings.sent1: The hiker heliographed news of the trail conditions to other hikers.
meanings.sent2: The general heliographed orders to the troops on the battlefield.
meanings.sent3: The bird heliographed a warning to the other animals in the forest.
meanings.sent4: The artist heliographed a beautiful scene onto the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The magician heliographed a mysterious symbol in the air during the show.
